text: __NOTOC__ Year 277 (CCLXXVII) was a common year starting on Monday of the Julian calendar. == Events == === By place === ==== Roman Empire ==== * Emperor Probus travels with his army west across the Sea of Marmara (Turkey). He defeats the Goths along the lower Danube. * Probus enters Rome to get his title of Emperor approved by the Senate. ==== Asia ==== * Tuoba Xilu succeeds his father Tuoba Liwei as chieftain of the Tuoba clan. == Births == * Sima Ai, prince of the Jin Dynasty (d. 304) * Zhang Mao, ruler of Former Liang (d. 324) == Deaths == * Tuoba Liwei, chieftain of the Tuoba clan (China) Category:270s
